attributes.title: Don‚Äôt use this app!

attributes.title: This is so bad the Apple Store need to delete this app

attributes.title: It killed me
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app with high hopes. But as soon as I opened it, orange cheeto dust blew out of my phone and blinded me. It was meant to be a celebration for me downloading the app I presume, but I was standing on the edge of my roof with my telescope trying to get a good look at the man on the moon and I FELL off!!!!!
So I am now writing this review as an actual ghost but I fear this will cause more widespread panic if people get this app. Please remove it, it‚Äôs a danger to our society!!!
Stay safe everyone‚ú®

attributes.title: Sucked my dog into a vortex üò°
attributes.review: I recently got this app to see what all the hype around it was about. I was very disappointed. The amount of notifications was too mich for my phone to handle, and it ripped it hole in the space time continuum. My dog frank got sucked right in. Until my dog is returned, I won‚Äôt be writing a decent review.

attributes.title: The worst

Not just that but there‚Äôs needs to be a warning sign for children this Cheeto dude scared my child and now he‚Äôs scared to go to sleep. attributes.title: Don‚Äôt download!!!!
attributes.review: Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony. Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked. Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them, but when the world needed him most, he vanished. A hundred years passed and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar, an airbender named Aang, and although his airbending skills are great, he has a lot to learn before he's ready to save anyone. But I believe Aang can save the world. ü§°

attributes.title: Horrid can‚Äôt think of anything worse
attributes.review: So the app takes a while to open which is a big pet peeve of mine and then its saying this like dumb person‚Äòs name over and over again and then it shows this fat blonde haired dude with an orange face with the no brain in front of a country he has literally destroyed so no idea what this app wants me to do but horrible app can‚Äôt think of anything worse thank you for reading.

attributes.title: Horrendous
attributes.review: After taking 42 weeks to download, the app opened up and completely destroyed my phone. Like destroyed to pieces. I had to walk to the Apple store to get a new phone because I have no mode of transportation except for my hooves. Once I got my new phone, the app kept popping up randomly on my new phone in the middle of the night. Eventually, the app exploded once again. Would never buy again.

attributes.title: BEWARE
attributes.review: honestly I was looking forward to keeping up with the latest TRUE news but when I downloaded it, I was astonished!!! Let me tell you, I cannot believe what they would allow to be the colors on this app!!! Like, what???!!! There is 100% something going on with this app. It deleted everything on my phone and, i‚Äî‚Äî well, you get the idea. I‚Äôm just bewildered our dear president would allow such things. **sigh**
